traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The hippocamp can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Charge
entries: If the hippocamp moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Hooves
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Ram
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.
